content: The Restaurant at Mosaic Hotel offers contemporary California cuisine in an intimate setting. Dine inside or al fresco on our heated pool patio while indulging in world-class flavors. Open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, The Restaurant at Mosaic provides a comfortable retreat with an elegant lobby bar showcasing the finest liqueurs, esoteric wines, and cocktails. Satisfy all of your end of day cravings by treating yourself to delicious bar bites and tasty cocktails.
